name: Lost In Forest (raoul632)
description:
Hello and welcome

Have you learned that your wife is lost in the forest.
Can you save her from the many animals that are there?

Roguelike done with the pixel engine, I thank Javidx and his community
as well as peteyCode, I followed its steps ..

But it remains a roguelike code from scratch in C ++. Hop you enjoy this short story
and its retro style (of course its a rogue like ;-) ).

Pyxel Engine : 
https://github.com/OneLoneCoder/videos/blob/master/olcConsoleGameEngine.h

DarkCavern: 
https://github.com/PeteyCodes/DarkCaverns
